Title: Bosch launches Hitachi airHome ductless heat pumps in U.S.
Summary: Bosch Home Comfort Group has introduced a new line of residential ductless heat pumps under the Hitachi brand. The airHome single and multi-room mini-split units are designed to lower utility bills

Title: Eurovent PG-AHU re-elects Lenz and Bijmans as leadership team
Summary: The Eurovent Product Group Air Handling Units (PG-AHU) has re-elected Martin Lenz as Chairperson and Andy Bijmans as Vice-Chairperson during its latest meeting at the 2025 Eurovent Summit in Prague

Title: EU Mid-Term Review Expands Cohesion Funding for HVAC Energy Efficiency and Sustainable Cooling

Title: Danfoss acquires Italy’s Palladio Compressors to expand screw technology range
